metadata.Name: STAIR Captions
metadata.Description: A large-scale Japanese image caption dataset constructed by manually curating and annotating images with descriptive captions.
metadata.Paper Title: STAIR Captions: Constructing a Large-Scale Japanese Image Caption Dataset
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the 55th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics
Affiliations: STAIR Lab, Tokyo Institute of Technology
metadata.Abstract: In this paper, we present STAIR Captions, a large-scale Japanese image caption dataset. The dataset consists of 800,000 image-caption pairs, which are manually curated and annotated. We describe the collection process and the quality of the dataset. We also provide a baseline model for image captioning using the dataset.
